ban.no_permission: You do not have permission to ban users.
ban.message_failed: Failed to send ban message to {user}.
ban.message: You have been banned from the server{for_duration}. Reason: {reason}

unban.no_permission: You do not have permission to unban users.

kick.success: {user} ({user_id}) has been kicked from the server. Reason: {reason}
kick.no_permission: You do not have permission to kick users.
kick.message_failed: Failed to send kick message to {user}.
kick.message: You have been kicked from the server. Reason: {reason}

warn.no_permission: You do not have permission to warn users.
warn.message_failed: Failed to send warning message to {user}.

note.success_local: Note added to {user}'s profile for this server: {note}
note.failure_local: Failed to add note to {user}'s profile for this server.
note.failure_global: Failed to add global note to {user}'s profile.
note.no_permission: You do not have permission to add notes.
note.no_global_permission: To add global notes, you need to authenticate.

timeout.success: {user} ({user_id}) has been put in timeout for {duration}. Reason: {reason}
timeout.failure: Failed to put user {user} in timeout.
timeout.no_permission: You do not have permission to put users in timeout.
timeout.message_failed: Failed to send timeout message to {user}.
timeout.message: You have been put in timeout for {duration}. Reason: {reason}

info.failure: Failed to retrieve information for user {user}.
